nodes.id: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

zh-cn: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

location.zh-cn: 中华民国新北市三重区
location.en: Sanchong District, New Taipei City, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家汽车客运公司，主要经营台北联营公车、新北市公车、桃园市市区公车及国道客运路线。由李炳盛于1968年创立，后于2019年由首都客运接手掌管，成为台北首都客运集团的一员。
description.en: A bus transportation company in Taiwan, primarily operating routes for the Taipei Joint Bus System, New Taipei City Bus, Taoyuan City Bus, and national highway buses. Founded by Li Bingsheng in 1968, it was taken over by Capital Bus in 2019 and became a member of the Taipei Capital Bus Group.

description.zh-cn: 政治人物及企业家，三重客运的创办人。曾任台北县议员、台湾省议员及监察委员。其子为李博文和李博仁。
description.en: A politician and entrepreneur, founder of San Chung Bus. He served as a Taipei County Councilor, Taiwan Provincial Councilor, and Control Yuan member. His sons are Li Bowen and Li Boren.

description.zh-cn: 李炳盛之子。继承首都客运后，于2019年7月成为三重客运董事长，使三重客运被首都客运接手。
description.en: Son of Li Bingsheng. After inheriting Capital Bus, he became the chairman of San Chung Bus in July 2019, leading to the takeover of San Chung Bus by Capital Bus.

description.zh-cn: 三重客运现任总经理，于2019年7月接替短暂任职的蔡正元。
description.en: The current general manager of San Chung Bus, who took over from the short-term manager Cai Zhengyuan in July 2019.

description.zh-cn: 李炳盛之子。曾继承并担任三重客运董事长，后于2019年7月被其兄弟李博文取代。
description.en: Son of Li Bingsheng. He inherited and served as the chairman of San Chung Bus before being replaced by his brother Li Bowen in July 2019.

description.zh-cn: 原三重客运总经理，于2019年7月李博文成为董事长后请辞。
description.en: The former general manager of San Chung Bus, who resigned in July 2019 after Li Bowen became chairman.

description.zh-cn: 前立法委员，在2019年7月曾短暂接任三重客运总经理20天。
description.en: Former legislator who briefly served as the general manager of San Chung Bus for 20 days in July 2019.

description.zh-cn: 台北首都客运集团的核心企业，为三重客运的母公司。
description.en: The core enterprise of the Taipei Capital Bus Group and the parent company of San Chung Bus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的汽车客运公司，为台北首都客运集团的成员。曾被三重客运投资，后由李博文购得。
description.en: A bus company in Taiwan and a member of the Taipei Capital Bus Group. It was previously invested in by San Chung Bus and later acquired by Li Bowen.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的汽车客运公司，三重客运曾对其进行转投资。
description.en: A bus company in Taiwan, in which San Chung Bus has invested.

description.zh-cn: 由台北市及新北市多家客运业者共同经营的市区公车系统。
description.en: An urban bus system jointly operated by multiple bus companies in Taipei City and New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 台北县（今新北市）的民意代表职位。
description.en: Elected representative position in Taipei County (now New Taipei City).

description.zh-cn: 台湾省议会的民意代表职位。
description.en: Elected representative position in the Taiwan Provincial Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国监察院的成员职位，负责监察政府。
description.en: Position of a member of the Control Yuan of the Republic of China, responsible for government oversight.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院的成员职位，负责立法。
description.en: Position of a member of the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China, responsible for legislation.

description.zh-cn: 台湾一个大型公路客运企业集团，旗下包含首都客运、台北客运、三重客运、台中客运及大都会客运等公司。
description.en: A large highway bus conglomerate in Taiwan, which includes companies such as Capital Bus, Taipei Bus, San Chung Bus, Taichung Bus, and Metropolitan Bus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的汽车客运公司，为台北首都客运集团的成员。
description.en: A bus company in Taiwan and a member of the Taipei Capital Bus Group.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的汽车客运公司，为台北首都客运集团的成员。
description.en: A bus company in Taiwan and a member of the Taipei Capital Bus Group.

relationships.target: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 李炳盛于1968年5月7日奉令核准创设三重客运。
description.en: Li Bingsheng was approved to establish San Chung Bus on May 7, 1968.

relationships.source: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 三重客运于1977年4月30日加入台北联营公车体系。
description.en: San Chung Bus joined the Taipei Joint Bus System on April 30, 1977.

relationships.source: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 三重客运曾借由转投资方式投资台中客运。
description.en: San Chung Bus previously invested in Taichung Bus through equity investment.

relationships.source: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 三重客运曾借由转投资方式投资统联客运。
description.en: San Chung Bus previously invested in Ubus (Tung-Lien Bus) through equity investment.

description.zh-cn: 在2019年7月召开的临时董事会中，李博文取代李博仁成为三重客运新任董事长。
description.en: In a special board meeting in July 2019, Li Bowen replaced Li Boren as the new chairman of San Chung Bus.

description.zh-cn: 原总经理简有政请辞后，由蔡正元接任其职位。
description.en: After former General Manager Jian You-zheng resigned, Cai Zhengyuan took over his position.

description.zh-cn: 蔡正元短暂任职总经理20日后，由李建文成为新任总经理。
description.en: After Cai Zhengyuan served as general manager for 20 days, Li Jianwen became the new general manager.

description.zh-cn: 文中提及蔡正元为前立法委员。
description.en: The text mentions that Cai Zhengyuan is a former legislator.

relationships.source: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 三重客运正式被首都客运接手掌管。
description.en: San Chung Bus was formally taken over by Capital Bus.

relationships.source: 三重汽车客运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 在被首都客运接手后成为集团一员。
description.en: Became a member of the group after being taken over by Capital Bus.

description.zh-cn: 短暂任职20天。
description.en: Served for a short period of 20 days.
